name: Untitled Coots Game
description:
Untitled Coots Game is a short 3d stealth adventure where you play as Coots the cat!

Ludwig forgot to feed his cats, so you have to sneak out to the store to get some snacks.

Use WASD to move around, SHIFT to run and SPACE to jump.

This game was made in less than a week for the Ludwig game jam. It's not super optimized so if you're experiencing low fps, consider changing your resolution in the options. There might also still be some collision bugs, please be careful running into walls etc

Thanks for giving it a try :)
